metadata.title: Jennifer Lopez - Unauthorized
description: From modest beginnings in the Bronx, New York City, to super stardom in Hollywood California, Jennifer Lopez lives the American Dream. Talent, perseverance, and a lot of hard work brought this Puertoricania to heights she never even imagined possible! Sh
